#summary How to compile python tesseract for Fedora

=How to compile python-tesseract for Fedora=
==Compile leptonica==
{{{
wget http://www.leptonica.com/source/leptonica-1.68.tar.gz
tar zxvf leptonica-1.68.tar.gz
cd leptonica-1.6.8
yum install giflib-devel libtiff-devel zlib-devel libpng-devel libjpeg-turbo-devel python-devel -y 
./configure --prefix=/usr
make
sudo make install
}}}


==Compile Tesseract OCR==
{{{
svn checkout http://tesseract-ocr.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ tesseract-ocr
./configure --prefix=/usr
make
make install
}}}
